mission_statement: To provide a high-performance, minimalist habit and goal-tracking ecosystem that balances the time-tracking precision of Toggl with the task-consolidation power of Akiflow.

tech_stack.database_backend: Convex (Real-time sync, Cron jobs, Vector search)

core_features.habit_tracking: Daily/Weekly/Monthly recurring logs with streak visualization and 'skip' logic.
core_features.goal_architecture: Hierarchical goals: Long-term Objectives -> Monthly Milestones -> Daily Actions.
core_features.time_blocking: A Toggl-inspired 'Quick Entry' bar at the top for instant task logging.
core_features.ai_coach: An AI-driven insight engine that analyzes habit consistency and suggests schedule adjustments.
core_features.analytics: GitHub-style heatmaps and velocity charts for goal completion.

habits.fields: userId (id), title (string), frequency (cron-like string), color (string), icon (string), reminderTime (string)

user_flow.1_onboarding: Clerk Auth -> Convex User Sync -> 'Identity Survey' (What are your top 3 goals?) -> Plan Selection.
user_flow.2_dashboard: Center: Daily Habit Checklist. Right: Goal Progress. Top: Quick Entry Bar.
user_flow.3_habit_creation: Shadcn Dialog with smart-suggestions (e.g., 'Read for 20 mins').
user_flow.4_billing: Clerk Billing <PricingTable /> with Pro/Enterprise tiers gating AI features and advanced analytics.

ui_ux_principles.minimalism: Use Geist Mono/Sans for a professional, technical look. Maximize whitespace.
ui_ux_principles.frictionless: Keyboard shortcuts (CMD+K) for adding habits/tasks immediately.
ui_ux_principles.feedback: Subtle animations (Framer Motion) when a habit is checked off to trigger a dopamine response.

file_structure_plan.purpose: Define the strict TypeScript schema for habits, logs, and users.
Queries for fetching daily lists and mutations for checking off habits.
Configure the JWT provider for Clerk-to-Convex communication.
Sidebar navigation containing Goals, Habits, Analytics, and Settings.
The main 'Command Center' with the daily log and progress heatmaps.
A custom Shadcn component for the habit check-box with click-and-hold interaction.
Card displaying AI-generated insights based on Convex Vector data.
Clerk route protection ensuring /dashboard and /billing are private.

ai_implementation_details.context_injection: Pass the last 30 days of habit logs to OpenAI to identify 'slump days'.
ai_implementation_details.natural_language_input: Allow users to type 'I want to run every Monday at 8am' and parse it into a Habit object via Convex Actions.

hosting_deployment.method: Dockerized Next.js container or PM2 process manager for the frontend; Convex handles the backend (Serverless).

prompt_to_ai_coder: Act as a Senior Full Stack Engineer. Build 'Vertex', a habit/goal tracker. Use Next.js 14, Clerk for auth, Convex for real-time DB, and Shadcn UI. Implement a high-performance dashboard that allows users to create habits, track them via a daily log, and view progress on a GitHub-style heatmap. Integrate Clerk Billing for a 'Pro' plan. Ensure the UI is professional, using a monochrome palette with strategic primary accents. Use Lucide icons. Focus on 'Zero Friction' entry methods like Akiflow.
